at.tm.rmi.server

Interface ServerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Server

    public interface ServerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    Version:
    08.01.2015 Interface of the Server class. This Interface extends the Interfaces Serializable and Remote. The extending of those two Interfaces in more precisely described in BalancerInterface It provides all essential methods for connection, PI calculation, name, registry and port management.
    Author:
    Patrick Malik

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        void connect(java.net.URI balancer)
      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Connects a server to the a balancer which necessary connectionarguments are given as parameters.
        Parameters:
        balancer - the URI the balancer runs on
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - is thrown when a remote error occurrs (e.g. no connection to the server)
